CustomField.formula: if(LEN(EBH_BillingAddress__c)>0, EBH_BillingAddress__c & " " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN(EBH_BillingStreet__c)>0, EBH_BillingStreet__c & " " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN(EBH_BillingCity__c)>0, EBH_BillingCity__c& ", " , "" )& if(LEN(EBH_BillingState__c)>0, EBH_BillingState__c& " " , "" )& if(LEN(EBH_BillingPostalCode__c)>0, EBH_BillingPostalCode__c,"") & BR() & If(LEN(EBH_BillingCountry__c) >0, EBH_BillingCountry__c,"")
CustomField.label: Address
